Result - Firefox 49.0b3 Beta Test day

August 19, 2016

Hello All!

The Firefox 49.0 Beta 3 Test Day tookplace in 12th of August. The main focus during the testing was around Windows 10 compatibility, Text to Speech in Reader Mode and Text to Speech on Desktop features. On August 10th, I posted a message in the Mozilla India telegram group, calling interested people to participate in this Test day.Shortly after the I sent the message, few pinged me that they are interested to join.

With more than 10 awesome contributors, the testday took place. Here are the bug hunters.

  • Md Shahbaz Alam
  • Paarttipaabhalaji
  • Selva Makilan
  • Bhuvana Meenakshi
  • Surentharan
  • Nagaraj Naidu
  • Ashly Rose Mathew
  • Kamlesh Vilpura
  • Dinesh Aj
  • Pavithra


At then end of the test day, we were able to file 5 bugs and verify resolved bugs in this beta.Thank you everyone for participating :)

Here is our results - Etherpad

Lets continue to participate in future Testdays and help Firefox and it's users.

The Mozilla QA has published the results of the testday - check out here

Happy Testing!

Prasanth P
